DOC.brief_title: HYBRID : Hydrogen Breath Test Lactose Digestion
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 inclusive Lactose intolerant The following criterion need check visit 2 : Lactose intolerance confirm positive Hydrogen Breath Test ( HBT ) ( i.e . two sample hydrogen level > 20 ppm increase compare baseline sample 90 min 240 min sampling time point ) . At least one sample hydrogen level > 20 ppm increase compare baseline 90 min 180 min sampling time point . History gastrointestinal disorder Current illness could interfere study ( e.g . diarrhea , regurgitation ) Any history cow 's milk protein allergy know allergy galactooligosaccharides Any current participation within 8 week study start , study involve investigational market product , medical procedure , surgical method . Any antibiotic , laxative colonic cleanse treatment within 4 week study start Any administration probiotic 1 week prior study start Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability subject comply protocol requirement The following criterion need check visit 2 : Level hydrogen > 20 ppm baseline breath sample . An early peak hydrogen ( i.e . hydrogen level > 20 ppm increase compare baseline value ) first 60 minute ingestion study product .
